roleset.name: to take hold of, comprehend
roleset.note: GRASP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grasp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from grasp.01-v predicate notes)
GRASP-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to grasp.01-v. VN classes hold-15.1-1 and comprehend-87.2-1. FN class grasp. Framed by Katie. (from grasp.01-n)

example.name: with manner
example.text: He could grasp an issue with the blink of an eye . ''
example.arg: with the blink of an eye

example.name: non-physical grasp
example.text: he has a firm grasp of the Shakespearean dynamic

example.name: understanding
example.text: Insurers struggled to to get a firm grasp on the volume of claims pouring into their offices .
example.arg: on the volume of claims pouring into their offices

example.name: both args
example.text: Her grasp of mathematics far exceeds mine
